answers.answer: I've felt the same way at times and I don't even work I'm a stay at home mom. Yesterday I couldn't even walk due to the pain and I almost broke down. Cheer up momma and hang in there , its all for a good cause. How far along are you?
I'm 37 weeks and 3 days. It's hard to get outta bed, get dressed, groom myself, walk up the stairs and even getting in the car is painful. How many weeks are you?

I'm 39-2 and I know exactly what you mean. I go through that everyday as well .I  have to have my kids help me all the time and once my 8 year old had to pull me out of the car bc I couldn't get out on my own. My feet swell up like balloons, I've had nausea, loss of appetite, diarrhea, and to top it off I have gestational diabetes. Its very rough I understand you very well. When will you be taking your maternity leave?

question: I'm happy and excited that I'm carrying my blessing.  Don't get me wrong I love being pregnant. I just hate the pain and suffering that I'm going through. Each day it gets harder for me to do my daily functions. Not to mention that I'm still working. That's a task in itself. Braxton hicks been killing me for the last few days. I'm not dilated yet and my pains feel like nothing I've ever experienced before. Anyone else feel this way?
title: 9 Month Blues
